name: Alice Run – 3D Endless Runner
description: Alice Run – 3D Endless Runner is a fun action game. The side-scrolling runner runs in an infinite path of Wonderland collecting coins until an obstacle stops her with the point being to achieve the highest possible score. Swiping the screen from side to side turns corners to change directions , while swiping backward or forward causes Alice to jump or slide under obstacles. Tap on the screen to hit the card soldiers of the Red Queen. Pick up power ups, upgrade different statistics and ride in the endless forest.
